title: A Taste of Forever
description: THE FINAL BOOK IN THE SAINTS OF SERENITY FALLS SERIES!In the blink of an eye, my life has become nothing but chaos.Murder. Kidnap. Mobsters. Arrests. Betrayal.As the carnage starts to pile up around us and the walls start closing in, there are only so many moves to make, only a very few cards to play.Nothing is as it seems, we don’t know who to trust and the bodies just keep piling up.But when those bodies become the ones I love the most, there’s nothing I can do but play this twisted game by its own rules.Not everyone wins the game, but we might just die trying.Read the Complete Series!The Saints of Serenity Falls series must be read in the following order:Book 1: A Burn so DeepBook 2: A Revenge so SweetBook 3: A Taste of Forever
author: Lily Wildhart
